description: This Grafana dashboard provides a comprehensive and detailed view of the state and activity of nodes within the Dymension consensus system, allowing network administrators and developers to monitor various critical aspects of the infrastructure in real time. The interface is designed to facilitate the tracking of node synchronization performance and efficiency, as well as the participation and voting power of validators within the network. Through this panel, users can quickly identify potential issues or confirm the proper functioning of the system, ensuring optimal operation and network security for Dymension's blockchain. This resource is essential for maintaining transparency and effectiveness in upholding the integrity of the blockchain.

options.content:
Dymension validator metrics

by Cumulo

panels.description: Last height the node signed a block, if the node is a validator
panels.title: Node Last Signed Height

panels.description: Number of missed blocks
panels.title: Missed blocks

panels.description: Voting power of the node if in the validator set
panels.title: Node Voting Power

panels.description: indicates whether a node is synchronising its state
panels.title: State Syncing

panels.description: Number of peers node’s connected to
panels.title: Connected peers

panels.description: current number of peers in the network
panels.title: P2P Peers

panels.description: Either NO SYNC (not block syncing) or SYNC (syncing)
panels.title: SYNC STATUS

panels.description: current height of the block in the Dymension consensus system
panels.title: Consensus Height

panels.description: number of transactions included in the block
panels.title: Nº Transactions Committed

panels.description: Total voting power of the missing validators
panels.title: Missing Validators Power

panels.description: The total number of bonded tokens in the network
panels.title: Total bonded tokens

panels.description: Status of the last blocks produced in the chain
panels.title: Last Blocks Chain

panels.description: Block size in bytes
panels.title: Block Size (bytes)

panels.description: Total number of transactions processed in the Dymension consensus system since inception
panels.title: Total txs

panels.description: Number of validators who did not sign in the Dymension consensus system
panels.title: Nº Validators missing blocks

panels.description: Total number of active validators in the Celestia consensus
panels.title: Consensus Validators

panels.description: Histogram of durations for each step in the consensus protocol
panels.title: Consensus Step Duration

panels.description: Time between BeginBlock and EndBlock in milliseconds in the Celestia system.
panels.title: Block Processing Time

panels.description: Time elapsed between the current block and the previous block in the Celestia consensus system
panels.title: Interval between Consensus Blocks

panels.description: Block size in bytes
panels.title: Consensus Block Size Bytes

panels.description:
Number of block parts received by the node

matches_current="true": Means that the received block part matches the block that the node is currently collecting. In other words, the received part is relevant to the block being formed.

matches_current="false": Indicates that the received block part does not match the block that the node is currently collecting. This means that the received part is not relevant to the block the node is trying to form.
panels.title: Number of block parts received

panels.description: Time between this and the last block.
panels.title: Block Interval Seconds Sum

panels.description: Total number of times a time interval between blocks has been observed in the Celestia system
panels.title: Block Interval Seconds Count

panels.description: Number of transactions pending confirmation that have not yet been included in a block

targets.legendFormat: Number of transactions pending confirmation that have not yet been included in a block

panels.title: Mempool size

panels.description: Transaction sizes in bytes
panels.title: Mempool  tx Size Bytes

panels.description: number of transactions that have failed in the mempool (group of unconfirmed transactions).
panels.title: Txs failed mempool

panels.description: Number of uncommitted transactions
panels.title: Uncommitted transactions

panels.description: The sum total of the size of all transactions in bytes present in the Celestia system mempool
panels.title: Mempool tx Size Bytes Sum

panels.description: total CPU time, both user and system, consumed by the process since its start-up
panels.title: Process CPU Seconds Total

panels.description: Total amount of virtual memory used by the process in bytes
panels.title: Current Process Virtual Memory Usage

panels.description: Sze of the resident memory used by the process, expressed in bytes
panels.title: Current Process Resident Memory Usage

panels.description: This metric provides a summary of the duration of rubbish collection cycle pauses in the Go runtime environment.
panels.title: Duration of Garbage Collection Pauses in Go

title: Dymension Validator
